name: Obecto Ltd.
tag_list: bulgaria, outsource, it, software, development, rich-internet-application, solutions, engeneering, game, internet, consultancy, audio-and-video, technology, online-events, social-network, data-visualization, custom
overview:
Obecto is an Interactive Agency focused on building human-centered Rich Internet Applications with a team, eager to apply its deep knowledge of technology and its innovative ideas in software engineering. Moreover, we keep a constant user focus and preach the importance of ongoing interaction with our customers in order to achieve the best results.

Key services:

  • Audio/Video conferencing
  • Multiplayer online game platforms
  • Mobile applications
  • Data Visualization
  • Custom Business Solutions
  • Workflow Management
  • Industrial Plant Monitoring
  • Consultancy and Training

Methodology:

  • Agile Model Driven Development (AMDD),
  • Extreme Programming (XP), -
  • Feature Driven Development (FDD),
  • SCRUM

Programming Languages: HTML5, Javascript, Java, JSP, J2ME, JSF, PHP, .NET, AIR, Flex, PL/SQL, XSLT, AIR
